responsibilities: Dive deep into data analytics and employ statistical methods to discover new alpha sources.
Continually refine existing signals for performance optimization.
Implement and oversee the trade execution process, ensuring strategies are executed effectively while minimizing costs and slippage.
Develop, backtest, and optimize trading models and strategies using advanced statistical and machine learning techniques.
Work closely with the Fund Manager to incorporate insights into trading decisions and strategy formulations.
Develop and enhance proprietary tools, platforms, and systems that support trading operations and strategy implementation.
Actively contribute to discussions about fund strategy, risk management, and capital allocation.
qualifications: Data analytics and statistical methods for alpha and signal research.
Model development, backtesting, and optimization using statistical and machine learning techniques.
Programming for developing and enhancing proprietary tools and systems.
Effective collaboration and communication in a team-driven setting.
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills focus on data analytics, statistical methods, trade execution, and the development of trading models and strategies using machine learning techniques. The emphasis is on optimizing trading models, backtesting, and developing proprietary tools for trading operations. There is no mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) specifically. The skills required are centered around data analytics, statistical methods, and machine learning, but these do not inherently imply the use of GenAI or LLMs. The job seems to be more focused on quantitative finance and trading strategy development rather than natural language processing or generative tasks typically associated with GenAI or LLMs.
